entrance.name: Pallet Town
entrance.description: Your name is Ash. You are in a small town: Pallet Town, the first stop for all aspiring Pokemon trainers in the Kanto region.
entrance.dialogue: You can go north to Professor Oak's lab.

pol.name: Professor Oak's Lab
pol.description: The lab is quiet and filled with research equpiment. Professor Oak sits at his desk, seemingly awaiting your arrival.
pol.dialogue: Hello Ash! I see you are ready to start your journey. I've been awaiting a new trainer for a very long time. I believe you are ready to choose your first Pokemon. You can choose between Bulbasaur, Charmander, or Squirtle.

items.name: Pokeball
items.description: A red and white standard Pokeball.
